rules_text:
Foreshadow {4}{R}{R} [i](You may cast this spell for its foreshadow cost. If you do, also trigger its “dies” ability when it enters.)[/i]
Flying
When Obsidian Hellkite dies, it deals 2 damage to up to one target creature or planeswalker. If that creature or planeswalker would die this turn, exile it instead.
